attributes.action: introduce a project to change the harmful energy source to cleaner energy source, in order to bring a halt to global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world is under threat because of the way we are using energy. The UK is one of the major nations that mostly uses energy that is harmful to the O-Zone layer and earth. Factories causing pullution cause Acid Rain, global warming and a huge threat to the earth. We must stop the pullution immedietly by introducing energy produced by cleaner sources (i.e Wind Power, Solar) even if this will require very hard work and money.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting. Please rephrase your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
